author: The Spiffing Brit
description:
Welcome to the big reveal of what I have been working on since 2021. The glorious return of Spifftopia but now as SPIFFTOPIA MMP! A massively multiplayer project where thousands of players in a free Minecraft server will attempt to survive in a brutally hardcore world where you only have one life.

THE STREAM: 

Spifftopia Gameplay Guide: https://youtu.be/lPkWPpxHWXY

YT Members:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRHXUZ0BxbkU2MYZgsuFgkQ/join
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/Spiffing
Twitter: @thespiffingbrit
Discord: https://discord.gg/spifftopia
Website: https://www.spifftopia.net/

Spifftopia MMP is a Minecraft civilisation event like no other and hopefully it brings you all a lot of fun happy memories and you get to partake in the action too. 

General FAQ:
What Version Of Minecraft - Java Version 1.20.4

Can I Pay To Win - No there are no micro transactions or paid gameplay advantages 

Can I Donate Without Playing - Yes your support will help fund this very costly server for other
title: I Need YOU To Die In Minecraft.
